content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(1, 1)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 1.0, 1.0) and a furnace (position 1.0, 1.0)

### Electricity group at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5)
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 1.5)
- Small electric pole (position 1.5, 3.5)
- Small electric pole (position 6.5, 4.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough copper-ore in your inventory before attempting to insert into the furnace. Monitor your inventory closely to avoid running out of essential materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when trying to craft without required ingredients
- Check the crafting requirements and ensure you have all necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items.
